Mendokusai
Tartarus

What's the point?

30 Jan 2018

I often feel guilty about how I choose to spend my time if I am not doing something I think is productive. I feel like I ought to spend every waking moment producing something or trying to better myself or whatever. But this week I thought that the reason to do something "productive" and the reason to do anything else at all is exactly the same. I do them for no other reason than because I can.
